match.c

00001 /* match.c -- triggering based on sequential input ------- */
00002 
00003 #include "ext.h"
00004 #include "ext_critical.h"
00005 
00006 #define ANYONE MAGIC
00007 #define NOVALUE 0x80000000
00008 
00009 typedef struct match
00010 {
00011     t_object m_ob;
00012     t_atom *m_seen,*m_want;
00013     short m_size;
00014     short m_where;
00015     void *m_out;
00016     t_critical m_critical;
00017 } t_match;
00018 
00019 void *match_class;
00020 
00021 void match_assist(t_match *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00022 void match_freebytes(t_match *x);
00023 void match_int(t_match *x, long n);
00024 void match_float(t_match *x, double f);
00025 void match_list(t_match *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv);
00026 void match_anything(t_match *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv);
00027 void match_atom(t_match *x, t_atom *a);
00028 void atom_compare(t_match *x);
00029 Boolean atom_equal(t_atom *a, t_atom *b);
00030 void outlet_atomlist(void *out, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00031 void match_clear(t_match *x);
00032 void match_set(t_match *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00033 void match_setwant(t_atom *temp, short ac, t_atom *av);
00034 void match_free(t_match *x);
00035 void *match_new(t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00036 
00037 t_atom atom_novalue = { A_LONG, {NOVALUE}  };
00038 t_symbol *ps_nn, *ps_list;
00039 
00040 int main()
00041 {
00042     setup((t_messlist **)&match_class, (method)match_new, (method)match_free, 
00043         (short)sizeof(t_match), 0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00044     addint((method)match_int);
00045     addfloat((method)match_float);
00046     addmess((method)match_list,     "list",     A_GIMME, 0);
00047     addmess((method)match_anything, "anything", A_GIMME, 0);
00048     addmess((method)match_set,      "set",      A_GIMME,0);                 
00049     addmess((method)match_clear,    "clear",    0);
00050     addmess((method)match_assist,   "assist",A_CANT,0);
00051     finder_addclass("Control","match"); 
00052     ps_nn = gensym("nn");
00053     ps_list = gensym("list");
00054 
00055     return 0;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void match_assist(t_match *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00059 {
00060     if (m == ASSIST_INLET)
00061         sprintf(s,"Input Sequence to be Matched");
00062     else 
00063         sprintf(s,"list of Matched Sequence");
00064 }
00065 
00066 void match_freebytes(t_match *x)
00067 {
00068     if (x->m_seen)
00069         freebytes(x->m_seen,(short)(x->m_size * sizeof(t_atom)));
00070     if (x->m_want)
00071         freebytes(x->m_want,(short)(x->m_size * sizeof(t_atom)));
00072 }
00073 
00074 void match_int(t_match *x, long n)
00075 {
00076     t_atom a;
00077     
00078     a.a_type = A_LONG;
00079     a.a_w.w_long = n;
00080     if (x->m_size)
00081         match_atom(x,&a);
00082 }
00083 
00084 void match_float(t_match *x, double f)
00085 {
00086     t_atom a;
00087     
00088     a.a_type = A_FLOAT;
00089     a.a_w.w_float = f;
00090     if (x->m_size)
00091         match_atom(x,&a);
00092 }
00093 
00094 void match_list(t_match *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00095 {
00096     long i;
00097     
00098     if (!x->m_size)
00099         return;
00100         
00101     for (i = 0; i < argc; i++)
00102         match_atom(x,argv+i);
00103 }
00104 
00105 void match_anything(t_match *x, t_symbol *s, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00106 {
00107     t_atom a;
00108     
00109     if (!x->m_size)
00110         return;
00111 
00112     a.a_type = A_SYM;
00113     a.a_w.w_sym = s;
00114     match_atom(x,&a);
00115     match_list(x,s,argc,argv);
00116 }
00117 
00118 void match_atom(t_match *x, t_atom *a)
00119 {
00120     long i;
00121     
00122     for (i = 0; i < x->m_size-1; i++)
00123         x->m_seen[i] = x->m_seen[i+1];
00124     x->m_seen[x->m_size-1] = *a;
00125     atom_compare(x);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void atom_compare(t_match *x)
00129 {
00130     long i;
00131     
00132     for (i = 0; i < x->m_size; i++) {
00133         if (!atom_equal(x->m_seen+i,x->m_want+i))
00134             return;
00135     }
00136     outlet_atomlist(x->m_out,x->m_size,x->m_seen);
00137 }
00138 
00139 Boolean atom_equal(t_atom *a, t_atom *b)
00140 {
00141     // check wild card match
00142     if (b->a_type == A_SYM && b->a_w.w_sym == ps_nn)
00143         return true;
00144         
00145     // matching type
00146     if (a->a_type == b->a_type) {
00147         if (a->a_w.w_long == b->a_w.w_long)
00148             return true;
00149         else
00150             return false;
00151     } else if (a->a_type == A_FLOAT && b->a_type == A_LONG) {   // different types
00152         float temp = a->a_w.w_float;
00153         long itemp = (long)temp;
00154         if (temp == (float)itemp) {
00155             if (itemp == b->a_w.w_long)
00156                 return true;
00157         }
00158         return false;
00159     } else if (b->a_type == A_FLOAT && a->a_type == A_LONG) {
00160         float temp = b->a_w.w_float;
00161         long itemp = (long)temp;
00162         if (temp == (float)itemp) {
00163             if (itemp == a->a_w.w_long)
00164                 return true;
00165         }
00166         return false;
00167     } else
00168         return false;
00169 }
00170 
00171 void outlet_atomlist(void *out, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00172 {
00173     if (argc == 1) {
00174         if (argv->a_type == A_LONG)
00175             outlet_int(out,argv->a_w.w_long);
00176         else if (argv->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00177             outlet_float(out,argv->a_w.w_float);
00178         else if (argv->a_type == A_SYM)
00179             outlet_anything(out,argv->a_w.w_sym,0,0);
00180     } else if (argv->a_type == A_FLOAT || argv->a_type == A_LONG)
00181         outlet_list(out,ps_list,argc,argv);
00182     else if (argv->a_type == A_SYM)
00183         outlet_anything(out,argv->a_w.w_sym,argc-1,argv+1);
00184 }
00185 
00186 void match_clear(t_match *x)
00187 {
00188     long i;
00189     
00190     for (i = 0; i < x->m_size; i++)
00191         x->m_seen[i] = atom_novalue;
00192 }
00193 
00194 void match_set(t_match *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00195 {
00196     t_atom *temp;
00197     char savelock;
00198 
00199     if (!ac)
00200         return;
00201 
00202     if (ac != x->m_size)
00203         temp = (t_atom *)getbytes((long)ac * sizeof(t_atom));
00204     else
00205         temp = x->m_want;
00206     match_setwant(temp,ac,av);
00207     savelock = lockout_set(1);
00208     critical_enter(x->m_critical);
00209     if (ac != x->m_size) {
00210         match_freebytes(x);
00211         x->m_want = temp;
00212         x->m_seen = (t_atom *)getbytes((long)ac * sizeof(t_atom));
00213     }
00214     x->m_size = ac;
00215     match_clear(x);
00216     lockout_set(savelock);
00217     critical_exit(x->m_critical);
00218 }   
00219     
00220 void match_setwant(t_atom *temp, short ac, t_atom *av)
00221 {
00222     long i;
00223     
00224     for (i = 0; i < ac; i++)
00225         temp[i] = av[i];
00226 }
00227 
00228 void match_free(t_match *x)
00229 {
00230     match_freebytes(x);
00231     critical_free(x->m_critical);
00232 }
00233 
00234 void *match_new(t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00235 {
00236     t_match *x;
00237     
00238     x = (t_match *)newobject(match_class);
00239     x->m_out = outlet_new((t_object *)x,0);
00240     critical_new(&x->m_critical);
00241     if (ac) {
00242         x->m_want = (t_atom *)getbytes((long)ac * sizeof(t_atom));
00243         match_setwant(x->m_want,ac,av);
00244         x->m_seen = (t_atom *)getbytes((long)ac * sizeof(t_atom));
00245         x->m_size = ac;
00246         match_clear(x);
00247     } else {
00248         x->m_seen = 0;
00249         x->m_want = 0;
00250         x->m_size = 0;
00251     }
00252     return x;
00253 }
